cast.overview: In the aftermath of an unspeakable act of terror, Police Sergeant Tommy Saunders joins courageous survivors, first responders and investigators in a race against the clock to hunt down the Boston Marathon bombers before they strike again.
cast.title: Patriots Day

details.biography: David Ortiz was born on November 18, 1975 in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. He is a producer and actor, known for Patriots Day (2016), Are You Afraid of the Dark? (1990) and American Masters (1985). He has been married to Tiffany Brick since November 16, 2002. They have three children.
details.name: David Ortiz
